Text.constructor

This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The Text() constructor returns a newly created Text object with the optional DOMString given in parameter as its textual content.

Syntax

text1 = new Text(); // Create an empty text node
text2 = new Text("This is a text node");

Example

text = new Text("Test");

Specifications

Specification Status Comment
DOM
The definition of 'Text()' in that specification.		 Living Standard Initial definition.
